definition[0]: to move your tongue across the surface of something in order to eat it, wet it, clean it etc
example[0]: The dog jumped up and licked her face.
example[1]: A cat licked up the drops spilt on the floor.
example[2]: He licked the drops off his upper lip.
example[3]: I bet we could lick the best teams in Georgia.
definition[2]: if flames or waves lick something, they touch it again and again with quick movements
example[4]: Soon the flames were licking at the curtains.
definition[3]: when you move your tongue across the surface of something
example[5]: Can I have a lick of your ice cream?
definition[4]: part of a song played on a guitar
